column4: I'm wondering if anyone can help me.  Whenever I use a JAVA program that works with sound I get bad distortion.  I'm using the Sun JRE and 11.04 ubuntu.  Anyone know why the two are not playing nice?
I'd really appreciate any help I could get
Confezzor: I have sun jdk installed as well.  JRE is required for the JDK
if you have the open JDK you shouldn't have the need to have the JRE from what i know i could be wrong
